answers.answer: I am addicted to red meat. I love greasy food. I know how you feel I am always hungry too.

That's the thing though, if I was craving meat I'd be fine cause there's really no carbs in it so I could eat as much as I want but I've never really been huge on meat and now I'm just sooo sick of it! I just want pasta and bread lol

Oh my gosh you're reading my mind! I'm 32 weeks with GD and this diet is the worst!!! We're pregnant so of course we're always hungry and now we can barely even eat. Of course we do it for the babies but that doesn't make it any funner. My family had a barbecue last night and I couldn't eat any of it because of the buns. So i had an omelette. I might be bitter. Haha is your baby measuring big at all?
Dink lots of water, it will help make you feel full :)

Omg yesss I feel you! I don't ever wanna eat another egg! My baby measured at 40 weeks when I was 35 weeks and she's just been getting bigger since then so I'm having a c section on Friday. They think she's gonna be close to 10 and a half pounds!
I drink water non stop partly cause I'm always thirsty and partly cause they say it helps you feel full but it doesn't seem to be helping :(
Yup, drinking lots of water. That's so awesome you're so close to the end. I'm jealous!!!! Sounds like you'll have a big baby :)

Haha it'll come faster than you think, don't worry and yeah I'm hoping she won't be as big as they're thinking but as long as she's healthy that's all that really matters (and she better be healthy so I at least didn't put up with this diet for nothing lol)

Same here I'm 35 weeks n have gestational diabetes and its so difficult to portion my food the way I was told because I feel so hungry after I eat like if I didn't even eat lol I do mess up here and there by drinking soda and eating candy but its only cause I crave it...is it bad to drink soda ?,& eat candy?

I definitely also slip up and eat cookies and stuff sometimes lol. But yeah pop and candy are suuuper bad cause they're nothing but sugar. Honestly though, if I'm really craving something I'll eat it right before bed because I take insulin at bed time anyways haha
Ok atleast I'm not the only one lol but I don't have to take insulin I just have to keep record of my sugars after the 3 main meals

I haven't slipped up yet, but I've only just started the diet. It's so hard!! And I know by the time I get to your ladies stages it will be even harder. But let's pray for healthy babies and a hospital with good cafeteria cake so we can celebrate after birth ;)

I'm 36 weeks with GD and on insulin. I struggled for awhile trying to find a diet that worked for me. I too was always hungry and sometimes I still feel like that. My issue was I would intake the amount of carbs and do all the right portions and my blood sugar readings would be of the charts but when I would eat a regular meal like before I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes my blood sugars were fine. Like today I had a baconator from Wendy's with fries and soda and when I took my reading two hours later it was 101 while I can eat a 1/4 cup of rice, chicken, and a whole can of greens beans and it will sometimes be over 120. It's strange so my doctors have kind of given me the red light to eat bigger meals that it know won't affect my blood sugars but still recommend that I take my insulin for dinner and the other insulin before bedtime. I feel like I have the strangest case of gestational diabetes. When you ladies did your glucose level test what we're your results? Mine was 190 after consuming 100th of pure sugar I believe.

question: Omg I feel like I'm going crazy with how hungry I am! I have gestational diabetes so my diet is really strict and it's making me so mad because for the last couple days I've been soooo hungry even after I eat. And I swear if I have to eat one more piece of chicken because it's "high in protein and good for me" I'm gonna lose it, all I want is a giant bowl of Mac and cheese lol. Any other ladies going through this? What do I do to quit being so hungry? It's like food is all that's on my mind lol.
title: 38 weeks and STARVING!!
